alert.note: Alert for Avoyelles; Evangeline; Rapides (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 03 at 4:46PM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Rapides, northwestern Evangeline and southwestern Avoyelles Parishes through 515 PM CST... At 445 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Turkey Creek, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Bunkie, Glenmora, Cheneyville, Turkey Creek, Lecompte, Hessmer, Echo, Poland and Ruby. This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 52 and 66. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
